data.meta_description: Oh hey. That's me! I had a very good experience meeting with Senator Boozman and his staff. We greatly appreciate his continued support of agriculture and…
data.text: 🌾🚀The Future of Agri-Food is in Arkansas!🚀🌾 Hey, fellow #AgriFood enthusiasts! 🌱 Ready to deep-dive into the transformative world of agriculture and food innovation? Join us on Nov. 2-3 at the Don Tyson Center for Agricultural Sciences in Fayetteville for the inaugural Arkansas Agri-Food Innovation Summit. Dive into federal funding opportunities and gain insights from national and state leaders who are shaping the future of the industry! Two tracks are available: Commercialization and Research. Feel free to register for just one or both. This event is historic. Perfect for #AgriTech professionals, students, and anyone passionate about shaping the future of food and agriculture.🌍 🔹 Dive into early-stage seed funding opportunities, with one-on-one meetings available with #SBIR and #STTR personnel. 🔹 Connect with USDA National Institute of Food and Agriculture officers for project discussions. 🔹 Listen to successful agri-food startup stories that went “from lab to launch.” 🔹 Engage with top academic researchers and industry CEOs on future agri-innovations. 🔹 Explore multiple funding avenues with expert panelists. 🔹 Tour cutting-edge facilities and enjoy highlights from Arkansas food entrepreneurs. Arkansas, let’s make our mark in leading the global agri-food supply chain revolution! 🌟 Register now for this FREE event, as space is limited! U of Arkansas System Division of Agriculture Arkansas Small Business and Technology Development Center Arkansas State University 🔗 https://lnkd.in/g2M2BXmr #FayettevilleEvents #Agriculture #FoodInnovation #ArkansasEntrepreneurs #FutureOfFarming
